thread.title: WILLMA ROBERTS

author: WILLMA ROBERTS
title: WILLMA ROBERTS
text:
The staff member who spoke to me was really on the ball and found exactly what would work for me since I wanted to meet other family members in Calgary airport. She co-ordinated everything AND got me a huge discount. THAT WAS S APPRECIATED
I will definitely come back to CheapOair next time I want to fly anywhere and you can be sure I will be telling all my friends about the discount.
W. Roberts
